imdb.plot outline: Mexico prepares to ring in the Bicentennial with a communications and transportation infrastructure that dreams of evolving into major logistics platform for international commerce, incorporating insofar as is possible the breakthroughs demanded by globalization in the digital era.
imdb.title: Historia de las Comunicaciones y Transportes en México, La comunicación globalizada
akas: Historia de las Comunicaciones y Transportes en México, La comunicación globalizada (Mexico)
plot: Mexico prepares to ring in the Bicentennial with a communications and transportation infrastructure that dreams of evolving into major logistics platform for international commerce, incorporating insofar as is possible the breakthroughs demanded by globalization in the digital era.::Clío TV
